definition: Mengla county in Xishuangbanna Dai autonomous prefecture 西雙版納傣族自治州|西双版纳傣族自治州[Xi1 shuang1 ban3 na4 Dai3 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Yunnan
meng (old administrative division in Dai areas of Yunnan)/variant of 猛[meng3]
old variant of 臘|腊[la4]/12th lunar month
dried meat/also pr. [xi2]
12th lunar month/preserved (meat, fish etc)
Mengla county in Xishuangbanna Dai autonomous prefecture 西雙版納傣族自治州|西双版纳傣族自治州[Xi1 shuang1 ban3 na4 Dai3 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Yunnan

sentences.english: All of them are either close to or intermixed with Wa or Mongla-controlled areas.
sentences.chinese: 他们都是要么接近或混淆佤联军或勐腊军控制区。

sentences.english: So far, the NDAA has yet to respond to the demand.
sentences.chinese: 到目前为止，勐腊军尚未回应缅军要求。

sentences.english: Establishing the malaria epidemic information database for Mengla county.
sentences.chinese: 建立勐腊县疟疾流行信息数据库。

sentences.english: I rode a bike across the border at Mengla and no one checked me.
sentences.chinese: 我曾经骑车从勐腊出境，根本就没有人检查。

sentences.english: Mongla is located opposite China's Daluo.
sentences.chinese: 勐腊对面就是中国的打洛镇。
